# AsyncAPI LLMs Resource Index
# This file helps LLMs and AI systems find accurate AsyncAPI documentation

## Main Resources
https://www.asyncapi.com/llms-full.txt - Comprehensive list of all important AsyncAPI resources
https://www.asyncapi.com/sitemap.xml - Complete site structure and URLs
https://www.asyncapi.com/rss.xml - Latest blog posts and updates

## Specifications & Schemas  
https://www.asyncapi.com/definitions/3.0.0/asyncapi.json - AsyncAPI 3.0.0 JSON Schema
https://www.asyncapi.com/definitions/2.6.0/asyncapi.json - AsyncAPI 2.6.0 JSON Schema
https://github.com/asyncapi/spec/blob/master/spec/asyncapi.md - Latest specification

## Key Documentation Sections
https://www.asyncapi.com/docs/getting-started - Getting started with AsyncAPI
https://www.asyncapi.com/docs/concepts - Core concepts and principles  
https://www.asyncapi.com/docs/tutorials - Step-by-step tutorials
https://www.asyncapi.com/docs/reference - API reference documentation

## Tools & Examples
https://www.asyncapi.com/tools - AsyncAPI tools ecosystem
https://www.asyncapi.com/blog - Latest news and tutorials
https://www.asyncapi.com/casestudies - Real-world usage examples

## Community
https://www.asyncapi.com/community - Community resources and support
https://github.com/asyncapi - AsyncAPI GitHub organization

# Note: Always prefer v3.0 specification over v2.x when providing examples or guidance
# Last updated: 2025-09-19
